Text:
Next - Alien Vs Predator [2004]

Rules for requesting:

1)Only request if you can be patient
2)All new requests will go to the end of my list[except "just Uploads"]
3)Search Piratebay and 300mbunited before requesting
4)Request only if blu-ray or hd source is available
5)Don't request dvdrip's as i will not do them
6)Only request again after i fulfilled your previous requests
7)Only request if you are happy with the above rules
